mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, SUM(gu.gas_usage) AS gasUsageAmount FROM t_gas_usage gu JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = gu.user_cd JOIN t_gas g ON gu.gas_cd = g.gas_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd

SELECT u.user_id, SUM(eu.elec_usage) AS elecUsageAmount FROM t_elec_usage eu JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = eu.user_cd JOIN t_elec e ON eu.elec_cd = e.elec_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND YEAR(elec_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(elec_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd

SELECT u.user_cd AS userCD, user_nm AS userNM, type AS usageType, charge AS unitCharge, elec_usage, elec_time FROM t_elec_usage eu JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = eu.user_cd JOIN t_elec e ON eu.elec_cd = e.elec_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND YEAR(elec_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(elec_time) = MONTH(CURDATE())

SELECT u.user_cd AS userCD, user_nm AS userNM, type AS usageType, charge AS unitCharge, gas_usage, gas_time FROM t_gas_usage gu JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = gu.user_cd JOIN t_gas g ON gu.gas_cd = g.gas_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND gas_time BETWEEN #{start_date} and #{end_date}

SELECT u.user_cd AS userCD, user_nm AS userNM, type AS usageType, charge AS unitCharge, elec_usage, elec_time FROM t_elec_usage eu JOIN t_user u ON u.user_cd = eu.user_cd JOIN t_elec e ON eu.elec_cd = e.elec_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND elec_time BETWEEN #{start_date} and #{end_date}

select user_local, round(sum(gu.gas_usage)) AS gasUsageAmount, round(sum(eu.elec_usage)) AS elecUsageAmount FROM t_user u JOIN t_gas_usage gu ON u.user_cd = gu.user_cd JOIN t_elec_usage eu ON u.user_cd = eu.user_cd WHERE YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(elec_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(elec_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) group by user_local
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_GAS_USAGE (user_cd, gas_cd, gas_usage, gas_time) VALUES (#{user_cd}, #{gas_cd}, #{gas_usage}, #{gas_time})
INSERT INTO T_ELEC_USAGE (user_cd, elec_cd, elec_usage, elec_time) VALUES (#{user_cd}, #{elec_cd}, #{elec_usage}, #{elec_time})
